meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I paid for my groceries at the store.
meanings.sent2: She paid the bill at the restaurant after dinner.
meanings.sent3: The cat paid for its mischief by knocking over the vase.
meanings.sent4: The sun paid its daily dues by painting the sky with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The student paid attention in class to learn new things.

meanings.definition: receiving money for work or a service
meanings.sent1: After finishing the job, he received his paid wages.
meanings.sent2: She was happy to see her hard work reflected in her paid salary.
meanings.sent3: The paid worker enjoyed the fruits of his labor with a smile.
meanings.sent4: The paid service was worth every penny for its quality.
meanings.sent5: The paid job provided a sense of accomplishment and satisfaction.

meanings.sent1: He paid his friend back the money he owed.
meanings.sent2: She paid off her loan in full to the bank.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel paid its nut debt to the tree with extra acorns.
meanings.sent4: The rain paid the parched earth with life-giving water.
meanings.sent5: The kind gesture paid off in the form of gratitude and friendship.
